explanations.machine learning: The abstract mentions that the framework harnesses the ability of Bayesian networks to characterize the probabilistic structure of superior decisions via machine learning. This indicates that machine learning is used in the development of the optimization framework.
explanations.reason: The other keywords are not mentioned or implied in the abstract.
